title: M.Y.T.H. Inc. Link
description: Skeeve's come a long way--from lowly magician's apprentice to President of M.Y.T.H. Inc. But it's business (and trouble) as usual. Now he's in charge of a myth-chievous gang that includes a pet dragon and an bookic vampire! One of the most profitable fantasy series published.
author: Robert Asprin

title: Myth-ing Persons
description: Skeeve is in a real pickle this time. His partner Aahz has disappeared, and it looks like foul play. Finding Aahz ought to be a snap for a talented magician like Skeeve, especially with a sassy apprentice and a dumb-but-brawny bodyguard along for the ride. The trouble is, they're sleuthing in another dimension.
author: Robert Asprin

title: Little Myth Marker
description: Jealous opponents of the young magician Skeeve and his demon mentor hire a top Character Assassin to force them out of business.
author: Robert Asprin

title: Another_Fine_Myth
description: After a magician's death, his apprentice, who is a thief, experiences a variety of adventures via a short-circuited dimension jumper.
author: Robert Asprin

title: War__under__the__Pacific
description: SOME CHAPTERS INCLUDE: A FORCE UNREADY FOR WAR; THE YEAR THAT TURNED THE TIDE; THE ENEMY BELOW; A TIME OF SLAUGHTER; AND ON SPECIAL ASSIGNMENT.
author: Keith Wheeler

title: Clear_the_Bridge
description: Tang carried the war to the enemy with unparalleled ferocity. This is her story as told by her skipper.From the Trade Paperback edition.
author: Richard H. O'Kane
